title: DevEx Lead - Board Smoke Test Validation
items: @devex-lead validate journal → GitHub board auto-population works
@devex-lead verify Issue creation with proper labels (from:journal, handoff, role:coordinator, status:Todo)
@devex-lead confirm Project Sync adds Issue to SecFlow Project (v2) board
@devex-lead test card movement when PR with Fixes #<issue> is created
@devex-lead document any workflow issues or improvements needed
